changelog.metadescription: KoolAjax is simple and easy-to-use PHP Ajax Framework, facilitating data exchange between server-side and client-side. KoolAjax also provides number of client-side utility functions to ease developing task. Furthermore, with UpdatePanel, a special feature of KoolAjax, developers can create a great ajax application without javascript knowledge.Using KoolAjax, you will be amazed with its power and simplicity.
changelog.metakeywords: php ajax,php ajax framework,php callback, ajax for php
changelog.log: - Fix client-side conflict with MooTools framework.
- Correct the position of UpdatePanel in IE8
- Enhance the loading process of UpdatePanel.
- Change Request class to KoolAjaxRequest - New property: KoolAjax::CharSet
- Solve issue of KoolAjax working with AutoComplete.
- Make KoolAjax work better with different languages.
- Enhance position of UpdatePanel's loading image.
- Fix KoolAjax's issue of parameter transporting.
- UpdatePanel now recognizes submit button as triggers. - Solve error "this._getCurrentBrowsers() is null" in FF3
- Enhance response of UpdatePanel and KoolAjax's callback - KoolAjax now can be registered in any place of your page, not just only at top of your page.
- Update ActiveX Object list for IE Ajax - Improve the debug mode.
- Enhance OnError event handle of UpdatePanel - Improve the return of callback() function.
- New property added: scriptFolder for manually setting the path to script folder.
- Big enhancement in handling ajax request. - Solved the issue of "not well-formed" warning. - Improved the return data type when page does the callback.
- Make KoolAjax work better with other kool controls.
- Enahnce setLoading function of UpdatePanel
- Enhance the render of JS library's absolute path.
- Enhance the loading panel of UpdatePanel. - UpdatePanel now can be nested.
- Make KoolAjax work better with WAMP Server
- Enhance KoolAjax to make it work when short_open_tag settings of PHP is disable. - Improve the loading panel, the loading image now is preloaded.

- New function: registerClientScript() enable us to set any client command to run from server-side. - New function: loadScript() which help to load any js library silently to page. - New function: loadCss() which help to load a CSS file silently to page. - UpdatePanel has been improved alot, the loading panel option has been added. - Bundle of loading image are provided.
- Enhance synchronous callback function. - Improve the Request class.

- Added attachData() function to UpdatePanel - Enhanced Request class - Added abort function to Request, helping to abort a request in neccesary cases. - Added timeout capability to KoolAjax. - Many new event handles has been added to Request class : onOpen, onSent, onRecieve, onDone, onError, onAbort.
- Enhanced UpdatePanel in handling callbacked data.

- UpdatePanel class has been added. - KoolScripting has been enabled in this version. With this feature,we can create UpdatePanel by adding XML directly on the page. - Enhanced KoolAjax in working with Linux. - Improve function callback feature with JSON.
- KoolAjax is first released.
